The main problem I'm going to have with JUnit 4 is not
being able to use it for Jena for at least a year ...

... because I can't see that we can assume all (or most,
or any for that matter) of our users are on Java 1.5; it's only
earlier this year we dropped support for 1.3. 

[We could,perhaps, require all our developers to got to 1.5.
 <fx:thinks/>
 No, I think not.]

Or have I missed something delightful?

-- 
Chris "jena.sourceforge.net" Dollin
It's called *extreme* programming, not *stupid* programming.
